title: COVID-19 tracker: Hetero's generic version of Paxlovid becomes first endorsed by WHO
author: Zoey Becker; Kevin Dunleavy; Fraiser Kansteiner; Angus Liu
description: The WHO has signed off on its first generic version of Paxlovid, granting prequalification to Hetero of India. | The WHO has signed off on its first generic version of Paxlovid, granting prequalification to Hetero of India. A study shows that a booster dose of an mRNA vaccine from Moderna or Pfizer produces a more durable antibody response. Plus more.
